sentences.sentence: He grins, delighted at the memory.
Parents clap and shriek with laughter while children look on with bemused grins as the daily ritual is performed.
sentences.translation: 家长们在一旁鼓掌、尖叫，孩子们则带着困惑的笑容看着每天的仪式。

sentences.sentence: My friend, who has a food stall in the caravanserai, is no exception and grins at me with an entire set of glinting gold.
sentences.translation: 我的一位朋友也不例外，他在商队旅馆里有一食品摊位，正朝我咧嘴微笑，露出一排金色的牙齿。
